text:
I have noticed this issue when using oauthlib.oauth1.Client

uri, headers, body = client.sign(...)

the body is unicode, which breaks requests.post(...)
title: oauthlib.oauth1.Client.sign(...) method breaks usage of python requests 2.8+
clean_text: I notic issu use oauthliboauth1cli uri header bodi clientsign bodi unicod break requestspost
